item.title: Westbrook 3-pionter beats Warrior in OT
item.description: Russel Westbrook 3-pointer with 0.1 seconds left in overtime sent the Oklahoma City Thunder to a 113-112 victory over the Golden State Warriors on Friday night.

item.title: NBA Wrap: Houston gets 4th straight win, 114-95 over Nets
item.description: Chandler Parsons scored 21 points, making six 3-pointers, and Houston easily picked up its fourth straight win by beating Brooklyn
